offer.title: Cabin Air Filter Special
offer.details: Includes replacement cabin air filters. Reg. price $200
offer.disclaimer: Must be presented at time of write-up. Only applicable to single cabin filter.  Some models may be slightly higher. Not valid with any other offers or in-store specials. Does not include sales tax and hazardous waste disposal fees ($5.65). Not retroactive. No cash value. See dealer for details. Limit one coupon per person. Coupon does not apply to prior purchases. Void where prohibited. See your service professional at BMW of Birmingham for details.

offer.title: Wiper Special
offer.details: Includes replacement of front wiper blades. Reg. price $125.

Does not include sales tax and hazardous waste disposal fees. Not retroactive. No cash value. See dealer for details. Limit one coupon per person. Coupon does not apply to prior purchases. offer.title: Alignment Special
offer.disclaimer: Coupon not valid with any other offer. Must present coupon at time of purchase. Limit one coupon per person. Coupon does not apply to prior purchases. Other Restrictions may apply. Void where prohibited. See your service professional at BMW of Birmingham for details.

offer.title: Service Your Way
offer.disclaimer: Valid only at BMW of Birmingham. Please present coupon when service order is written. Taxes and hazardous waste disposal fees extra. Not valid in conjunction with other coupons or discounts (oil change, drains or refill services). Other restrictions may apply.  Limit one coupon per VIN #. See your service professional at BMW of Birmingham for details.
